summary:
A quest mod that has players explore an abandoned Sanctuary.
Discover the secrets of a legend that was forgotten by many and remembered by few.
descriptionHtml:
First mod attempt using the Skyrim Creation Kit. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
The Dragon War tore the lands of Skyrim apart. People and creatures alike seem lost in the chaos. 
But for some it brings a new life. 
Legend tells of a boy and a dragon; would be enemies for the time; forming a friendship that saves them and the lives of many. 

Discover the secrets of a legend that was forgotten by many and remembered by few. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*Need Dragonborn DLC 
*The skill Magelight is highly recommended for some of the areas. 
*Make sure the mod is on the bottom of the data list if your experiencing crashes when trying to load. 

--------------- 
How to start 
--------------- 
Go to the Dead Man's Drink at Falkreath and talk to the NPC Ave. 
*Make sure to have subtitles on*
author: Grace
